effect.name: Voxel Model 2
effect.author: MuddyMole / Sketchy / Adam Hawker
effect.description:
Display 3D voxel models with basic lighting.
Last Updated: 2026-01-11 00:56

parameter.name: offsetX
parameter.description: Position offset from centre (pixels)

parameter.name: offsetY
parameter.description: Position offset from centre (pixels)

parameter.name: offsetY
parameter.description: Position offset from centre (pixels)

parameter.name: imageWidth
parameter.description: Image width (pixels)

parameter.name: imageHeight
parameter.description: Image height (pixels)

parameter.name: imageRows
parameter.description: Number of rows of frames in the image

parameter.name: imageColumns
parameter.description: Number of columns of frames in the image

parameter.name: imageFirstFrame
parameter.description: The id of the first frame to use

parameter.name: imageLastFrame
parameter.description: The id of the last frame to use

parameter.name: rotateOrder
parameter.description: The order in which to perform rotations

parameter.name: lightAmbient
parameter.description: Ambient light colour and intensity

parameter.name: lightDirectional
parameter.description: Directional light colour and intensity

parameter.name: fog
parameter.description: Fog colour

parameter.name: rotateX
parameter.description: Angle to rotate the model about the X axis (degrees)

parameter.name: rotateY
parameter.description: Angle to rotate the model about the Y axis (degrees)

parameter.name: rotateZ
parameter.description: Angle to rotate the model about the Z axis (degrees)

parameter.name: cameraDistance
parameter.description: The distance of the camera from the centre of the model (pixels)

parameter.name: cameraClipNear
parameter.description: Hide any voxels closer than this to the camera (pixels)

parameter.name: cameraClipFar
parameter.description: Hide any voxels further than this from the camera (pixels)

parameter.name: cameraMagnify
parameter.description: Magnify the output by this amount

parameter.name: lightX
parameter.description: X component of directional light vector

parameter.name: lightY
parameter.description: Y component of directional light vector

parameter.name: lightZ
parameter.description: Z component of directional light vector

parameter.name: fogNear
parameter.description: Distance at which fog starts to appear

parameter.name: fogFar
parameter.description: Distance at which fog becomes completely opaque
